website_summaries.verdict: Planet Robobot is the prettiest and most creative Kirby game to hit the Nintendo 3DS. Kirby fans will love taking the adaptive Robobot Armor for a spin, too.
pros: The Robobot Armor is pure destructive fun

customer_reviews.title: I have to admit, I am more of a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I am more of a fan of the classic approach to Kirby games– where Kirby is unaided by anything other than the classic Kirby powers and a sidekick or two. With that being said, this is an entertaining, charming installment, and is worth the money if you have some time to kill on a classic character.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: SHE LOVES THIS GAME
customer_reviews.text: She loves the game even more than she loved the demo. Would have been nice to download it immediately, but she needed a bigger sd card. (Only had the 2GB card that came with her 3DS)
customer_reviews.author: MaryJane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Kirby game
customer_reviews.text: Very good platform game! Super fun. All Kirby forms are fun and usefull. Same goes for the robot. The game is really amazing. The only problem is its difficulty. Its kinda easy. I'm already old and played a lot of games like this since the super nintendo. So the game difficulty may be more suited to younger players. Tought anyone who likes games like this will enjoy it. I did.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Strang

customer_reviews.title: I think this might be my all time favorite
customer_reviews.text: I think this might be my all time favorite Kirby game. I love the robot aspect! Very fun game!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Southerland

customer_reviews.title: Digital code is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: My son chose this game and I am glad I selected the digital code. It was quick and easy. Plus I don't have to worry about him losing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Baccam-Ecklor

customer_reviews.title: Hostile Take Over
customer_reviews.text: This game made me smile and have genuine fun. Other games that are more difficult leave a feeling of satisfaction. The two don't feel the same and I'm glad Planet Robobot was fun from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Justin mermelstein

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as digital download. Took a few tries for it to work before I could download it.
customer_reviews.author: Samael

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, yet similar
customer_reviews.text: Very well done game. At the same time it is still just another Kirby, but is that a bad thing?
customer_reviews.author: Eve Flowerwilt

customer_reviews.title: Not a good gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift off my brother's wish list. There is no way to give it to him. All I can do is redeem the code myself, which is pointless. I guess I can hand him my 3ds, so he can what his gift might have been like.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, this game single handedly got me back into ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, this game single handedly got me back into the Kirby franchise, Kirby is such a cute, yet creative series of games.
customer_reviews.author: dante nova

product_meta.title: Kirby: Planet Robobot - 3DS [Digital Code]
product_meta.description:
Harness the power of a mysterious mech to stop ruthless invaders from mechanizing Kirby's home world. Smash through tough obstacles, lift heavy objects with ease, and scan enemies to shape-shift into new Modes with powerful abilities in this supercharged action-platformer! That's right—Kirby's Robobot Armor can shape-shift into different modes by scanning enemies to copy their moves—like the new Jet Mode. Not to mention, Kirby can copy abilities the old-fashioned way too—by inhaling them! After saving the world, team up with three friends to defeat foes in Team Kirby Clash, an RPG-styled 4-player* brawl where you choose from varied roles and level them up. 

System Requirements: * Supported Platforms:Nintendo - 3DS


Nintendo account required for game activation and installation
feature_bullets: Use the mysterious Robobot Armor to scan enemies and shape-shift into powerful Modes
Kirby's Copy Ability returns, allowing him to inhale, spit out foes, and copy abilities
Use the Download Play feature in Team Kirby Clash, an RPG-styled mode for up to 4 players* (or sharpen your skills by playing solo)
